body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Watson Solutions. My name is Brian Watson. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, Brian. My name is Jennifer Rivera.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great to meet you, Jennifer. To assist you better, may I kindly ask for your phone number and email address?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five five five, six seven eight, nine zero one two. And my email is jennifer.rivera@email.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect, thank you for providing that information, Jennifer. Is there any other detail you would like to share with me today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Actually, I'm feeling happy as I'm considering purchasing a new vehicle from your dealership.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: That's wonderful to hear, Jennifer. We strive to offer the best car-buying experience. If you have any questions, feel free to ask.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I appreciate that, Brian. Your customer service has been excellent so far.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your kind words, Jennifer. It's been a pleasure assisting you. If you need any further help, don't hesitate to reach out.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time today. Have a great day, Jennifer. Goodbye.
